description: Comprehensive transcript summarization evaluation across multiple model sizes and architectures

experiments.name: Claude-Sonnet-Basic-Summary
experiments.system_prompt: You are a professional meeting analyst. Provide clear, concise summaries based on the transcript content. Do NOT include reasoning or explanations - only provide the requested summary.
